Package com.prc.alp.liaison.plugin

Provides primary functions for enabling ALP/Cougaar PlugIns to manage liaisons with external agents and agent societies, and to check their liaison permissions.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Liaison Defines those entities that know how to perform liaison management by being capable of producing a LiaisonManager.
LiaisonStateModel Defines state transitions for liaison with external agent socieities; not currently in active use.
 

Class Summary
CoABSLiaisonDeputy The CoABSLiaisonDeputy class manages interactions with an external society of agents through a CoABS Grid.
LiaisonDeputy Mediates interactions with an external society of agents.
LiaisonManager Supports the establishment of contact and the administration of interactions between a PlugIn and agents in some external agent society.
LiaisonManagerProxy A proxy service object for allowing the LiaisonManager representing a PlugIn as an agent to provide services by remote procedure call.
LiaisonStateModelAdapter An implementation of LiaisonStateModel; not currently in active use.
SimpleLiaisonPlugIn A SimplePlugIn that runs in its own thread and that implements support for liaisons with external agents through the LiaisonManager interface.
 

Package com.prc.alp.liaison.plugin Description

Provides primary functions for enabling ALP/Cougaar PlugIns to manage liaisons with external agents and agent societies, and to check their liaison permissions.

See Also:
com.prc.alp.liaison.admin
